mapper.sql: id, account, roleName, status, level, jingYan, shengJiJingYan, sumds, keYongDs, totalJy, qiXueDs, jingLiDs, gongJiDs, suDuDs, totalXue1, totalJing1, totalGong, totalSuDu, CreateData, zhiye, chengHao, shengJiXiaoLv, tiLiZhi, jin, yin, sex, img, zuoBiao
mapper.select:
select * from new_role where id in
#{employeeId}
select * from new_role where rolename like #{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select (case when totalXueZb is null then 0 else totalXueZb end)+totalXue2 as totalXue2, (case when totalJingZb is null then 0 else totalJingZb end)+totalJing2 as totalJing2, (case when totalSuDuZb is null then 0 else totalSuDuZb end)+totalSuDu as totalSuDu, (case when totalGongZb is null then 0 else totalGongZb end)+totalGong as totalGong, id,account,roleName,status,level,jingYan,shengJiJingYan,sumds,keYongDs,totalJy,qiXueDs,jingLiDs,gongJiDs,suDuDs,totalXue1,totalJing1,zhiye,chengHao,shengJiXiaoLv, tiLiZhi,jin,yin,sex,img,zuoBiao from (select
(
select kangXingTotal from(select kangXing,sum(xiaoGuo)kangXingTotal from ( SELECT kangXing,xiaoGuo FROM baoshi b where exists ( select * from ( SELECT baoShi1 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi2 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi3 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 )A where b.id=A.baoshi1) and status=1
union all select kangXing,wqXiaoGuo xiaoGuo FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1) a group by kangXing) a where a.kangXing ='气血'
) as totalXueZb, round(r.level*r.chengzhang*(r.qiXueDs+r.chuxue*0.8)) as totalXue2, ( select kangXingTotal from(select kangXing,sum(xiaoGuo)kangXingTotal from (
SELECT kangXing,xiaoGuo FROM baoshi b where exists ( select * from ( SELECT baoShi1 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi2 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi3 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 )A where b.id=A.baoshi1) and status=1
union all select kangXing,wqXiaoGuo xiaoGuo FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1) a group by kangXing) a where a.kangXing ='精力' )as totalJingZb, round(r.level*r.chengzhang*(r.jingLiDs+r.chujing*0.8)) as totalJing2, ( select kangXingTotal from(select kangXing,sum(xiaoGuo)kangXingTotal from (
SELECT kangXing,xiaoGuo FROM baoshi b where exists ( select * from ( SELECT baoShi1 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi2 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi3 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 )A where b.id=A.baoshi1) and status=1
union all select kangXing,wqXiaoGuo xiaoGuo FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1) a group by kangXing) a where a.kangXing ='速度'
) as totalSuDuZb, round(r.chengzhang*(r.suDuDs+r.chusu)) as totalSuDu, ( select kangXingTotal from(select kangXing,sum(xiaoGuo)kangXingTotal from (
SELECT kangXing,xiaoGuo FROM baoshi b where exists ( select * from ( SELECT baoShi1 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi2 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi3 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 )A where b.id=A.baoshi1) and status=1
union all select kangXing,wqXiaoGuo xiaoGuo FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1) a group by kangXing) a where a.kangXing ='攻击'
) as totalGongZb, round((r.level*r.chengzhang*r.chugong/7)+r.chugong*r.chengzhang*0.5+r.level*r.chengzhang*r.gongJiDs*0.2) as totalGong, r.* from (select m.*,n.chengzhang,n.chuxue,n.chugong,n.chujing,n.chusu from new_role m,role_jichu n where m.zhiye=n.zhiye) r where id=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER}) role

select (case when totalXueZb is null then 0 else totalXueZb end)+totalXue2 as totalXue2, (case when totalJingZb is null then 0 else totalJingZb end)+totalJing2 as totalJing2, id,account,roleName,status,level,jingYan,shengJiJingYan,sumds,keYongDs,totalJy,qiXueDs,jingLiDs,gongJiDs,suDuDs,totalXue1,totalJing1,zhiye,chengHao,shengJiXiaoLv, tiLiZhi,jin,yin,sex,img,zuoBiao from (select (
select kangXingTotal from(select kangXing,sum(xiaoGuo)kangXingTotal from ( SELECT kangXing,xiaoGuo FROM baoshi b where exists ( select * from ( SELECT baoShi1 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi2 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi3 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 )A where b.id=A.baoshi1) and status=1
union all select kangXing,wqXiaoGuo xiaoGuo FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1) a group by kangXing) a where a.kangXing ='气血'
) as totalXueZb, round(r.level*r.chengzhang*(r.qiXueDs+r.chuxue*0.8)) as totalXue2, ( select kangXingTotal from(select kangXing,sum(xiaoGuo)kangXingTotal from (
SELECT kangXing,xiaoGuo FROM baoshi b where exists ( select * from ( SELECT baoShi1 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi2 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 union all SELECT baoShi3 FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1 )A where b.id=A.baoshi1) and status=1
union all select kangXing,wqXiaoGuo xiaoGuo FROM role_new_zhuangbei r where roleid=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zb=1) a group by kangXing) a where a.kangXing ='精力' )as totalJingZb, round(r.level*r.chengzhang*(r.jingLiDs+r.chujing*0.8)) as totalJing2,
r.* from (select m.*,n.chengzhang,n.chuxue,n.chugong,n.chujing,n.chusu from new_role m,role_jichu n where m.zhiye=n.zhiye) r where id=#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER}) role

mapper.update:
update new_role
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
roleName = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jingYan = #{jingyan,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shengJiJingYan = #{shengjijingyan,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sumds = #{sumds,jdbcType=INTEGER},
keYongDs = #{keyongds,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalJy = #{totaljy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qiXueDs = #{qixueds,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jingLiDs = #{jinglids,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gongJiDs = #{gongjids,jdbcType=INTEGER},
suDuDs = #{sududs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalXue1 = #{totalxue1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalXue2 = #{totalxue2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalJing1 = #{totaljing1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalJing2 = #{totaljing2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalGong = #{totalgong,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalSuDu = #{totalsudu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreateData = #{createdata,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
zhiye = #{zhiye,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chengHao = #{chenghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shengJiXiaoLv = #{shengjixiaolv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tiLiZhi = #{tilizhi,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jin = #{jin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
yin = #{yin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zuoBiao = #{zuobiao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update new_role set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roleName = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jingYan = #{jingyan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shengJiJingYan = #{shengjijingyan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sumds = #{sumds,jdbcType=INTEGER}, keYongDs = #{keyongds,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalJy = #{totaljy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qiXueDs = #{qixueds,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jingLiDs = #{jinglids,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gongJiDs = #{gongjids,jdbcType=INTEGER}, suDuDs = #{sududs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalXue1 = #{totalxue1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalXue2 = #{totalxue2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalJing1 = #{totaljing1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalJing2 = #{totaljing2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalGong = #{totalgong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalSuDu = #{totalsudu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateData = #{createdata,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, zhiye = #{zhiye,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chengHao = #{chenghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shengJiXiaoLv = #{shengjixiaolv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tiLiZhi = #{tilizhi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jin = #{jin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yin = #{yin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zuoBiao = #{zuobiao,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
